column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The space is very small and very crowded. If you walk in at a busy time
column2: you will probably have to wait outside cause the space in there is so tiny. With the space being small and so dense with people
column3: you'd have to scream to be able to talk to your friends cause it's so loud. The food took around 20-30 minutes to make. The ramen was really good and I guess it'll suffice for the long wait time. I would not recommend this restaurant for those who are going with a large group of people or with kids.
